enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Medill Sophomores & Juniors
title: JOUR JOUR 301-0-23 Journalism in Practice

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Money really does make the world go around, and this class will help you better understand why that is and how journalists can report and write compelling stories about money. We'll focus on who has it, who doesn't and why, delving into the role that money plays in personal finance, the economy, entrepreneurship, mom-and-pop shops and much more. You'll produce insightful, compelling narratives about a commodity that people think about and use every day but often don't fully understand.?

subject: JOUR
